travel.name: Travel Reimbursement
travel.documentation: Original receipts, boarding passes, hotel bills

meal.name: Meal Reimbursement
meal.documentation: Original bills with GST, attendee list for client meals

medical.name: Medical Reimbursement
medical.documentation: Original medical bills, prescriptions, diagnostic reports

process.application: Submit through People Portal within 30 days
process.approval: Manager approval for amounts up to ₹10,000
process.documentation: Original receipts mandatory, photocopies not accepted
process.timeline: Processed within 15 working days of approval
